MonsterTrait.Name: Shapechanger
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting (Abomination Form Only)
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuanti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15). The yuanti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day: suggestion 1/day: fear

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack (Abomination Form Only)
MonsterTrait.Text: The yuanti makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Constrict
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuanti can't constrict another target.

MonsterAction.Name: Scimitar (Abomination Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.
